thread.title: 40% off Eurocamp breaks when you visit 2 or more parks this summer holiday
thread.title_full: 40% off Eurocamp breaks when you visit 2 or more parks this summer holiday - Mirror Online

author: By Emma Munbodh
title: 40% off Eurocamp breaks when you visit 2 or more parks this summer holiday
text:
Camping holiday specialists Eurocamp has kicked off a new 'Park Hopper' deal offering families 40% off when they visit two or more destinations this summer.
The company is offering up to 40% off for those who want to visit more than one resort in late July and August, taking their pick of beach, countryside or city locations.
And the more guests ‘hop’, the more they save. The highest discounts are on multiple stays, meaning a long, hot summer exploring some of Europe’s most popular and picturesque spots has never looked so appealing.
The Eurocamp offer provides guests with the option of spending up to four-nights in each location.
Eurocamp’s Head of Marketing, Chris Hilton, said: “We are always looking for new ways to help travellers liberate their holidays and make the most of their time away and we hope this deal will inspire even more people to do just that.
Holiday-bargain hunters can also save 25% on their 2016 summer holiday and an additional 5% when they book before 31 July 2015 with discount code 16-EARLY .
Find out more about the 25% off deal here , or for more information visit Eurocamp .
